Write-Up Text: There is commentary on the upcoming federal budget in Australia with concerns raised regarding the Albanese government prioritizing defense over social welfare. People are calling for an increase in the JobSeeker welfare payment. Health Minister Mark Butler is proposing a major crackdown on e-cigarettes and vaping in the budget. The oil and gas industrys failure to pay taxes and royalties is being criticised. Other issues discussed are stagnating wages and disability funding and support and inaction on environmental issues and a transition to renewable energy.
